message: Starting generation of Rosenhan study questions. Analyzing study details and crafting questions covering diagnostic validity, methodology implications, and critical thinking aspects.

Crafting 4 questions: 1 learning (basic study facts), 1 application (implications for diagnosis), 1 tricky (limitations/interpretations), and 1 additional on methodology. Ensuring clinical accuracy and educational value.

COMPLETED: Generated 4 high-quality Rosenhan study questions. Coverage: (1) Learning - pseudopatient methodology and basic facts, (2) Application - implications for diagnostic validity, (3) Tricky - paradox of patient detection vs staff detection, (4) Application - follow-up experiment demonstrating bidirectional bias. All questions include comprehensive explanations with 2-3 sentence correct rationales and detailed incorrect option explanations. Questions are clinically accurate, educationally valuable, and properly formatted as JSON array.
